text: I forgot a couple of things.

What is it?
Should I go buy it for you?

No, no! Please don't worry about it!
It's not something essential.

Since there are other units too, I was thinking maybe
I could use my own camera instead of a smartphone.

I see, a camera...
Oh, how about using disposable cameras this time?

Using something other than a smartphone
would give a different feel.

Haha, I see.
Then shall I go get some?
